mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDENT_PROJECT ( IP_PROJECT_NAME, IP_USER_NAME, IP_USER_CONTACT, IP_USER_PHONE, IP_TEAM_NAME, IP_TEAM_CONTACT, IP_TEAM_PHONE, IP_PRICE, IP_USER_TYPE, IP_USER_ID, IP_DESCRIPTION, IP_SERIAL, IP_SOURCE, IP_STATE )VALUES ( #{projectName}, #{userName}, #{userContact}, #{userPhone}, #{teamName}, #{teamContact}, #{teamPhone}, #{price}, #{userType}, ${userId}, #{description}, #{serial}, #{source}, ${state} );
mapper.update: UPDATE INDENT_PROJECT i SET i.IP_PROJECT_NAME =#{projectName} , i.IP_USER_NAME =#{userName} , i.IP_USER_CONTACT =#{userContact} , i.IP_USER_PHONE=#{userPhone} , i.IP_TEAM_NAME =#{teamName} , i.IP_TEAM_CONTACT =#{teamContact} , i.IP_TEAM_PHONE =#{teamPhone}, i.IP_PRICE =#{price}, i.IP_DESCRIPTION = #{description}, i.IP_USER_TYPE=#{userType}, i.IP_USER_ID=${userId}, i.IP_SERIAL=#{serial}, i.IP_SOURCE=#{source}, i.IP_STATE=${state} WHERE i.IP_ID = ${id};
mapper.select: SELECT i.IP_ID AS id, i.IP_PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, i.IP_USER_NAME AS userName, i.IP_USER_CONTACT AS userContact, i.IP_USER_PHONE AS userPhone, i.IP_TEAM_NAME AS teamName, i.IP_TEAM_CONTACT AS teamContact, i.IP_TEAM_PHONE AS teamPhone, i.IP_PRICE AS price, i.IP_USER_TYPE AS userType, i.IP_USER_ID AS userId, i.IP_DESCRIPTION AS description, i.IP_SERIAL AS serial, i.IP_SOURCE AS source, i.IP_STATE AS state FROM INDENT_PROJECT i WHERE i.IP_USER_TYPE =#{userType} AND i.IP_USER_ID=${userId} ORDER BY i.IP_ID DESC;

SELECT i.IP_ID AS id, i.IP_PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, i.IP_USER_NAME AS userName, i.IP_USER_CONTACT AS userContact, i.IP_USER_PHONE AS userPhone, i.IP_TEAM_NAME AS teamName, i.IP_TEAM_CONTACT AS teamContact, i.IP_TEAM_PHONE AS teamPhone, i.IP_PRICE AS price, i.IP_USER_TYPE AS userType, i.IP_USER_ID AS userId, i.IP_DESCRIPTION AS description, i.IP_SERIAL AS serial, i.IP_SOURCE AS source, i.IP_STATE AS state FROM INDENT_PROJECT i WHERE i.IP_ID = #{id};
